AbilityScoreFeature.Name: Ability Score Increase
AbilityScoreFeature.Text: Your ability scores each increase by 1.

SubRace.Name: Gavony
SubRace.Description: Whether safe behind the walls of the High City of Thraben or out in the moors with little more than shuttered windows, barred doors, and grim determination to stand against the horrors of the night, the humans of Gavony are the most well-rounded people of Innistrad.
